description_data.ground_name: Stadium or ground where match played
description_data.lineup_announce: Indicates if match lineup is released - 1 means announced, 0 means not yet
description_data.match_format: Indicates match type - 1 = ODI, 2 = Test, 3 = T20, 4 = T10
description_data.match_title: Title or round of the match
description_data.home_team_squad: List of players in home team squads
description_data.away_team_squad: List of players in away team squads
description_data.last_match_played: Indicates if player played previous match - 1 = Played, 0 = Not played
